attributes.action: The people of Scotland wish a vote of No Confidence against the First Minister.
attributes.background: After receiving overwhelming opposition to the latest referendum bid and the First Minister now retracting her wish to join EU, but still pressing for a referendum the office of First Minister has now become untenable.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
